mapper.select: SELECT * FROM noticeTbl ORDER BY nt_num desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO noticeTbl (nt_num, nt_title, nt_content, nt_writer) VALUES (nt_num.nextval, #{nt_title}, #{nt_content}, #{nt_writer})
mapper.update: UPDATE noticeTbl SET nt_title=#{nt_title}, nt_content=#{nt_content}, nt_writer=#{nt_writer}, nt_date=SYSDATE WHERE nt_num=#{nt_num}
